entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
